sentences.sContent: In the new period, the studies of this issue by scholars both in and out of China are isochronous , with more and more achievements and different voices coming out.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the new period, the studies of this issue by scholars both in and out of China are isochronous , with more and more achievements and different voices coming out.
sentences.sCn: 进入新时期以来，大陆学者和港台、海外汉学界对这一问题的探索和论证基本上趋于同步了，越来越多的研究成果和不同声音浮出水面。

words.tran: [天][气象][物] 等时线；瞬压曲线

trans.tranOther: having the same duration; equal in time
